meta.title: Kohelet | Business Automation & Custom Software Development
meta.description: Deploy AI agents and custom software that scale your business without scaling headcount. Automate 60-80% of manual work in 90 days. Web apps, mobile apps, intelligent workflows.
meta.keywords: business automation, AI agents, custom software development, web app development, mobile app development, workflow automation, AI chatbots, lead qualification automation, data processing, Next.js development, React development

hero.tagline: Built for Scale. Powered by Automation.

secondary.prefix: Stop wasting 20+ hours per week on

hero.subtitle: Most businesses still operate like it's 2015—manual data entry, copy-paste workflows, spreadsheet chaos. While they burn hours on repetitive tasks, their automated competitors capture market share with AI agents handling customer support, lead qualification, and operations 24/7. The question isn't whether to automate. It's how quickly you can start.

solutions.section_subtitle: We don't just write code—we architect systems that scale your business without scaling your headcount.

pillars.title: Custom Software Development
pillars.description: Bespoke web and mobile applications built for your exact workflows. No more forcing your team into rigid SaaS tools. We build software that adapts to you—scalable, secure, and designed for rapid deployment.

pillars.title: Business Automation
pillars.description: Intelligent workflows that eliminate manual work. From data processing to lead routing, we build automation systems that run 24/7—so your team can focus on strategic growth instead of repetitive tasks.

pillars.title: AI Agents
pillars.description: Deploy AI agents that work 24/7—handling customer inquiries, qualifying leads, processing data, and executing workflows while your team focuses on high-value activities. Reduce manual work by 60-80% within 90 days.

hero.subtitle: We're a team of engineers and automation specialists who believe businesses deserve better than off-the-shelf solutions. Every workflow we build, every agent we deploy, is crafted for your specific needs.

story.missionText: To eliminate the gap between what technology can do and what businesses actually use it for.
story.visionText: A world where every business operates at peak efficiency, powered by intelligent automation.

narrative.p1: Kohelet started with a simple observation: most businesses are drowning in manual work that machines could handle better. We saw companies spending thousands of hours on repetitive tasks while their competitors raced ahead.
narrative.p2: We don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Every automation we build is designed around your specific workflows, your team's needs, and your growth goals. No templates, no compromises.
narrative.p3: Our approach combines deep technical expertise with genuine business understanding. We're not just developers—we're partners in your operational transformation.

values.sectionSubtitle: The principles that guide every project we build

items.title: Automation-First Thinking
items.description: Before writing a single line of code, we identify what shouldn't require human time. Every project starts with mapping repetitive tasks—whether it's lead qualification, data entry, or reporting—and architecting systems that handle them automatically. We don't just build software; we engineer time back into your day.

items.title: Radical Transparency
items.description: You'll always know what we're building, why we made specific technical decisions, and where your investment is going. No obscure jargon to justify billable hours. No surprises in scope or timeline. We share our development process in real-time because the best products emerge from informed collaboration, not information asymmetry.

items.title: Outcomes Over Outputs
items.description: We don't measure success by features shipped or hours logged. A chatbot that qualifies 80% of leads automatically matters more than one with 50 integrations. A landing page that doubles conversions beats one with fancy animations. We optimize for the metrics that actually move your business forward—everything else is commentary.

items.title: Built to Evolve
items.description: The systems we build today need to scale with you tomorrow. That's why 97% of our clients are still clients. We architect for flexibility, document obsessively, and stay engaged as your business grows. When you hire more salespeople or expand to new markets, your software adapts—without expensive rebuilds.

cta.headline: Ready to Automate?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can transform your operations.
